title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the category with the largest amount of mandatory spending.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a difference in spending between at least two spending categories, according to the chart.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
